CN.content:

2. PC61BM

2. PC61BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P5 |
| PC61BM |
| P6 |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast , the PCE suddenly decreased in the blended device of P5 and PC61BM ( 3.02% ) and further decreased in P6 ( 2.09% ) , mainly due to the significant decrease of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. P5
3. PC61BM (Polycrystalline silicon solar cell with a specific name)
4. P6
5. J SC (J SC stands for "Junction Scarcity" which is a parameter used to describe the quality of the solar cell)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - a measure of the efficiency of converting sunlight into electrical energy in a solar cell.
2. PC61BM - a specific type of polycrystalline silicon solar cell.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to Material Property in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) |
| PC61BM |

2. J SC (Joint Space Capability)
3. PC61BM (Personal Computing Environment 61BM)

These entities are mentioned in the paragraph as having different values for material property, which are:

1. PCE: 3.02% decrease
2. J SC: significant decrease
3. PC61BM: 2.09% decrease
